com.ui
Class AbstractModelessWindow

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      com.ui.AbstractModelessWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
WindowProcessTemplateListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
AssocSelectFrame, CommonRtvFrame, CommonTransferFrame, CountsFrame, IdtFrame, PriceAuditFrame, PriceChangeFrame, ReportRequestFrame, ReportTextFinderFrame, ReportViewer
public abstract class AbstractModelessWindow
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, WindowProcessTemplateListener

A frame to be used throughout the Launch Pad application which pocesses common funcationality for all its descendents.

The object is best used as the main application window or as a stand alone modeless frame.

Author:
rterrell
See Also:
Serialized Form

singleton

protected boolean singleton
Controls whether a window can exists as multiple instances.

By default, this indicator is set to true. The descendent desires to allow muliple instances, then this indicaator should be set prior to invocation of the ancestor initFrame().

public AbstractModelessWindow()
                       throws java.awt.HeadlessException

java.awt.HeadlessException

AbstractModelessWindow

public AbstractModelessWindow(java.awt.Dimension size,
                              java.awt.Point pos,
                              java.lang.String winTitle)
                       throws java.awt.HeadlessException
Creates a NmAbstractModelessUI with a sub title.

Parameters:
size - the window's dimensions in terms of size and position
pos - the location where the window is to be positioned.
winTitle - a String that will be appended to the title of the window.
Throws:
java.awt.HeadlessException
Method Detail

initFrame

protected void initFrame()
Perform common frame initializations.

Currently, the frame's title is set here. At the descendent level, override this method to perform more specific constructor related initialization tasks.

instanceExists

protected boolean instanceExists()
Verifies if this window instance is already open and visible to the user.

Returns:
true if the window is open and visible to the user or false if the window has yet to be launched.

displayRecordCount

protected void displayRecordCount()
A stub method for displaying a message concerning the total number of records retrieved.

When implementing this method, be aware that its invocation is at the end of the initFrame method.
